/* com.innobiz.orange.web.or.dao.OrUserImgDDao.selectOrUserImgD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'USER_IMG_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.USER_IMG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_IMG_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.USER_UID DESC, N.USER_IMG_TYP_CD DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.USER_UID, T.USER_IMG_TYP_CD, T.IMG_PATH, T.IMG_WDTH, T.IMG_HGHT, T.MODR_UID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.MOD_DT, 120) MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'USER_IMG_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.USER_IMG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_IMG_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM OR_USER_IMG_D T
AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.USER_IMG_TYP_CD = #{userImgTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.USER_UID, T.USER_IMG_TYP_CD
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
